public abstract class Button extends com.github.hanyaeger.api.entities.impl.TextEntity implements com.github.hanyaeger.api.userinput.MouseButtonPressedListener, com.github.hanyaeger.api.userinput.MouseEnterListener, com.github.hanyaeger.api.userinput.MouseExitListener
Derive this class in order to create a button on the screen

  • Constructor Details

    • Button

      public Button(com.github.hanyaeger.api.Coordinate2D initialLocation, String text, World world, javafx.scene.paint.Color color, javafx.scene.paint.Color hoverColor)
      Abstract class to handle the default behaviour of a button. This class should be extended upon and the action should be implemented in the sub class Default behaviour includes color changing, and setting the cursor to a hand.
      Parameters:
      initialLocation - The location for the button
      text - The text that is displayed on the button
      world - Instance of the current game
      color - The main color for the button
      hoverColor - The color for the on hover effect
